fieldVolumeDescription1: If you wish, you can attach Swift, S3 containers and private or public Git repositories to your job, which we recommend you configure beforehand via AI Dashboard.
fieldVolumeDescription2: Once attached, these will be temporarily loaded and cached near your instance to reduce latency and improve performance. A best practice is to attach one container with your incoming data, and another with your outgoing data.
containerTitle: S3 container, private Git repositories and OVHcloud Object Storage
datastoreDescription: S3, private Git repositories and OVHcloud Object Storage (swift)
containerFieldHelper: The container of the volume. It will be created on the fly if it does not exist in the Datastore
permissionDescription: In `Read Only` mode, no synchronization is initiated at the end of execution. This makes finalization quicker.
cachingDescription: Cached containers can be reused by other AI products without additional synchronization. Containers are removed from the cache after a period of inactivity.
